mapper.select: SELECT user_admin.users.user_id, user_admin.profiles.user_name, user_admin.profiles.emai_address, user_admin.users.created_at, user_admin.last_transactions.created_at AS updated_at FROM user_admin.last_transactions LEFT JOIN user_admin.transactions ON user_admin.last_transactions.transaction_id = user_admin.transactions.transaction_id LEFT JOIN user_admin.profiles ON user_admin.transactions.transaction_id = user_admin.profiles.transaction_id LEFT JOIN user_admin.users ON user_admin.transactions.user_id = user_admin.users.user_id LEFT JOIN user_admin.deleted_users ON user_admin.users.user_id = user_admin.deleted_users.user_id WHERE user_admin.deleted_users.user_id IS NULL ORDER BY user_admin.last_transactions.created_at DESC
